tooltip.ioreborn.energy_meter.descriptio: A peripheral used to measure energy, take control of it (blocking it from passing) and indicate things.
tooltip.ioreborn.sensor.description: A sensor used to get nearby entities data, such as distance or name.
tooltip.ioreborn.cryptographic_accelerat: A peripheral used to generate cryptic things.. TODO
tooltip.ioreborn.mag_card_reader.descrip: A device used to write or read §eMag Cards§7 data and transmit it to computers with event.
tooltip.ioreborn.rfid_writer.description: A device used to write on §eRFID Cards§7
tooltip.ioreborn.rfid_reader.description: A device used to read §eRFID Cards§7 data and transmit it to computers with event.
tooltip.ioreborn.biometric_scanner.descr: A peripheral used to scan player fistprint and transmit it to computers with event.
tooltip.ioreborn.proximity_card.descript: Just a random item, no utility for now.. TODO
